snippet.title: Onto Maizilind Unto Infinity Trailer
snippet.description:
OMUI is a game about humankind's suicidal instincts, interweaving grand geopolitical destruction with personal tragedy. It unfolds as a world-ending nightmare: a playful childhood afternoon quickly descends into the trauma of the Iranian Revolution, transforms into a nuclear apocalypse, and concludes with the sudden death of my Uncle Ramin. 

Content Warnings: suicide, death, war, nuclear war, flashing lights and colors.
